name: SOS Meals on Wheels
description: SOS Meals on Wheels serves the Oakland and surrounding areas with daily home-delivered meals for homebound seniors, providing nutrition and social connection for over 50 years.
fullDescription: SOS Meals on Wheels serves the Oakland and surrounding areas with daily home-delivered meals for homebound seniors, providing nutrition and social connection for over 50 years.
whatTheyOffer:
- Hot meal delivered daily, Monday-Friday
- Frozen weekend meals
- Special diets available (diabetic, low-sodium, pureed)
- Friendly volunteer check-ins
- Suggested donation, but no one turned away
howToGetIt: Call to apply. You must be 60+ and homebound due to illness, disability, or frailty. Staff will assess your needs and schedule meal deliveries.
